name: @receiptor/node-imap
author: Brian White <mscdex@mscdex.net>
description: A fork of the famous and outdated IMAP module for node.js that makes communicating with IMAP servers easy

scripts.release:major: npm run co:login && npm run build && npm version $(semver $npm_package_version -i major) && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.release:minor: npm run co:login && npm run build && npm version $(semver $npm_package_version -i minor) && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.release:patch: npm run co:login && npm run build && npm version $(semver $npm_package_version -i patch) && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.prepare: npm run co:login && npm run build
scripts.co:login: aws codeartifact login --tool npm --repository packages --domain receiptor-ai --domain-owner 004797659942 --region eu-west-3
